security: This document contains personal information (names, social security numbers, salaries) of individuals employed by the Select Committee on Assassinations. Releasing this information could violate privacy and potentially expose individuals to identity theft or other harm.
summary: This is a U.S. House of Representatives report from March 7, 1979, detailing the payroll for the Select Committee on Assassinations for the accounting period of February 1-28, 1979, including employee names, social security numbers, positions, and salaries.
summary_one_paragraph: This certification report from the U.S. House of Representatives, dated March 7, 1979, outlines the payroll for the Select Committee on Assassinations for the period of February 1-28, 1979. It lists employees, their social security numbers, job titles, annual salaries, and the amount earned during the accounting period. It also includes a payroll summary categorizing employees as clerical, professional, and investigative, with the total salary expenditures for each category and a certification that all listed employees performed their assigned duties and have no prohibited relationships with members of Congress.
title: Select Committee on Assassinations Payroll Report
